summary: The **Lowering Infant and Toddler Tuition for Learning and Education Act of 2025** (LITTLE Act of 2025) aims to amend the Internal Revenue Code to support childcare. It proposes a childcare provider startup credit (30% of qualified expenses up to $10,000) and increases/makes refundable the household and dependent care credit. The latter credit's applicable percentage is 50%, decreasing based on adjusted gross income, with defined qualifying individuals and employment-related expense limits.
